Text: Kern River Gas Transmissions Position in the Gas OIRprevious allparty meetings Kern has stated its position on key issues in the Gas OIR Its position has also been stated in a positions matrix which was distributed to all parties At the October th meeting Kern would like to make a short minute presentation of its current position with respect to the Interm Proposal put forth by SoCalGas as well as longterm structural issues A brief handout will be provided at the meeting Mike Harris NavigantReed Consulting on behalf of Kern River Gas Transmission

Kern River Gas Transmissions Position in the Gas OIRprevious allparty meetings Kern has stated its position on key issues in the Gas OIR Its position has also been stated in a positions matrix which was distributed to all parties At the October th meeting Kern would like to make a short minute presentation of its current position with respect to the Interm Proposal put forth by SoCalGas as well as longterm structural issues A brief handout will be provided at the meeting Mike Harris NavigantReed Consulting on behalf of Kern River Gas Transmission
